author: therealailyn
text:
I like being me. It's exciting to live as myself.✨ 
#TwentyFiveTwentyOne

author: therealailyn
text:
We can be sad today, and be okay tomorrow.✨
#KimNamjoon

author: therealailyn
text:
You have to learn how to be flexible. You can't live in this world if you only know how to break.✨
#TwentyFiveTwentyOne

author: therealailyn
text:
It's not a failure, but a hardship.✨
#TwentyFiveTwentyOne

author: therealailyn
text:
He has made everything beautiful in its time.✨
Ecclesiastes 3:11

author: therealailyn
text:
Love is like a ghost, everyone has heard of it but no one has seen it.✨
#WhyWomenLove

author: therealailyn
text: May you never get tired of fighting life's challenges.✨

author: therealailyn
text:
When my anxious thoughts multiply within me, Your comfort delights my soul.✨
Psalm 94:19

author: therealailyn
text:
When confronted with sadness or pain, don't resist and just push through it.✨
#TheOneAndOnly

author: therealailyn
text:
It can be difficult, but do your best to find happiness.✨
#TwentyFiveTwentyOne

author: therealailyn
text:
We have the strength to get back up again. So let's be frustrated as we want when things are tough. Let's be sad as we want.✨
#TwentyFiveTwentyOne

author: therealailyn
text:
You stay quite, while a war happens within you.🔳
#thoughtnow

author: therealailyn
text:
Even if life gets tough, don't give up on the things you like. Live your life doing whatever you can, whether it be success or failure.✨
#TwentyFiveTwentyOne

author: therealailyn
text:
Don't belittle your achievements." ✨ 
- Coach Nim
Acknowledge your achievements no matter what how small they are.✨
#TwentyFiveTwentyOne

author: therealailyn
text: Keep going.☑️☑️☑️ https://t.co/zgQAlNMfKJ

author: therealailyn
text:
Don't let hopelessness bring you down.✨
#ThoughtOfMe

author: therealailyn
text:
You'll encounter difficulties, but you have to keep an open mind. Don't be the bull endlessly ramming its horns into the corner of the room. Life is not just about what you do, its more about how you do it.✨
#TheFarewell

author: therealailyn
text: Look ahead with hope.✨

author: therealailyn
text:
Loving myself doesn't require anyone else's permission.✨
#AnswerLoveMyself #BTS https://t.co/F0TGMaASli

author: therealailyn
text:
You don't need people understanding. It's fine as long us you understand yourself.✨
#OurBelovedSummer

author: therealailyn
text:
New chapter begins.✨🎉💫
#HappyNewYear2022

author: therealailyn
text:
The fact that I'm breathing is enough proof that I'm doing well despite not shining brightly all the time.✨
#YouAreMySpring

author: therealailyn
text:
Let the morning bring me word of your unfailing love, for I have put my trust in you. Show me the way I should go, for to you I entrust my life.✨
#Psalm143:8 #MerryChristmas #HappyBirthdayJesus #HappyHolidays

author: therealailyn
text:
I believe that uselessness is useful. I believe that you need to have days that other people consider wasteful, to be able to focus more on useful things later.✨
#KimSeokjin  #GQKorea

author: therealailyn
text:
I try not to think about identity. If you obsess about it, you end up worrying too much. I think it's perfectly fine to go with the flow, rather than constantly striving and struggling all the time.✨
#MinYoongi #GQKorea

author: therealailyn
text:
True sorrow is like a song. It won't make you sad from the start. But it's the chorus parts repeatedly stacking up an unforgettable melody. If you think sorrow came too suddenly, that's because you kept ignoring the low notes in the front part.✨
#MoreThanBlue

author: therealailyn
text:
Being good at your job without empathy isn't something to be proud of. Empathy links to intelligence.✨
#OurBelovedSummer

author: therealailyn
text:
The thing about love and hate is that there's a very thin line between them.✨
#OurBelovedSummer

author: therealailyn
text:
The world looks gray, you feel like you're walking in a long endless tunnel, and you don't want to meet or talk to anyone. I want to make you smile.✨
#Melancholia

author: therealailyn
text:
You might not be able to see the future but there's a version of you that's coming soon where everything is going to be okay.✨
#RogerLee

author: therealailyn
text:
If you keep sinking endlessly, you have to hit the bottom eventually. Like the state of nothingness. Once you let everything go, you can dream of a new beginning.✨
#Melancholia

author: therealailyn
text: Pray, trust and wait.✨

author: therealailyn
text:
It's okay to pause. There's no need to run without knowing the reason. It's okay not to have dream, as long as there are your moments to briefly feel happiness.✨
#Paradise  #BTS

author: therealailyn
text:
At the end of the day, in this world full of chaos, let yourself be the soft rain.✨
#RayiNoormega

author: therealailyn
text:
Failure is the mother of success.✨
#MAMA #JHOPE

author: therealailyn
text:
One day it'll certainly be a good day
You will not be alone, always
I'll be by your side, we'll be okay
If I'm with you, it'll surely be brighter tomorrow
#GoodDay  #BTS

author: therealailyn
text:
I always wanted my own space, a space that was completely mine.✨
#Happiness

author: therealailyn
text:
Keep walking forward. No matter what anyone says. Take your time and get to know yourself.  You have a lot of time.✨
#WorkLaterDrinkNow

text:
